description:
Blueprint https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/libvirt-set-admin-password was implemented for libvirt in the liberty release of nova and according to the spec and code, libvirt 1.2.16 is required to use it:

http://specs.openstack.org/openstack/nova-specs/specs/liberty/implemented/libvirt-set-admin-password.html

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/185910/

The hypervisor support matrix in nova still lists the set admin password operation as missing for libvirt though, which is not entirely true, but it has to be noted that libvirt 1.2.16 is required to use it.
title: hypervisor support matrix is incorrect for set admin password and libvirt in liberty+

comments.content:
Blueprint https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/libvirt-set-admin-password was implemented for libvirt in the liberty release of nova and according to the spec and code, libvirt 1.2.16 is required to use it:

http://specs.openstack.org/openstack/nova-specs/specs/liberty/implemented/libvirt-set-admin-password.html

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/185910/

The hypervisor support matrix in nova still lists the set admin password operation as missing for libvirt though, which is not entirely true, but it has to be noted that libvirt 1.2.16 is required to use it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/240053
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/240053
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=474727d2c5306dca9760502231302f80f4a498b2
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 474727d2c5306dca9760502231302f80f4a498b2
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Oct 28 14:37:10 2015 -0700

    Mark set-admin-password as complete for libvirt in support matrix
    
    The set-admin-password virt driver API was implemented for libvirt
    qemu/kvm x86 in liberty per 520a6b92853cf0f6ef183df78c41c70ee0b8cfab but
    the hypervisor support matrix wasn't updated.
    
    This updates the support matrix and also adds notes that libvirt 1.2.16
    is required along with hw_qemu_guest_agent configuration in the backing
    image.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1511114
    
    Change-Id: Iee1d628116cad8c0c60c8335a2910b3c4e1b5e2d
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
